question: Most common diaphragmatic hernia in child -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., Bochdalek o The most common varient of congenital diaphragmatic hernia is a posterolateral defect also known as Bochdalek's hernia. This anomaly is encountered most commonly on the left, o Morgagni Hernia is anteromedial retrosternal variety of CDH.
